mapper.select: select t1.*, (select t2.name from sys_org t2 where t2.id = t1.parent_id) parentName from sys_org t1 where t1.db_status = 1 order by t1.sort asc
select t1.id, t1.parent_id from sys_org t1 where t1.db_status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_org ( parent_id, name, note, sort, db_status, creator, create_time) values ( #{parentId}, #{name}, #{note}, #{sort}, #{dbStatus}, #{creator}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_org where db_status != 0 and parent_id = #{parentId}
